iiif_url_template.description: URL template for lookup of images via IIIF based on {{ unique_identifier }}, {{ page_id }}, {{ page_no }} and {{ PPN }}. 'left', 'top', 'right', 'bottom', 'width', and 'height' are replaced by the neat JS.

scale_filegrp.description: If the OCR was run on images with a different resolution thant the 'full' IIIF size, use the images in this file group to scale. Set to empty string to disable

keep_words.description: After updating the line TextEquiv, remove (false) or keep (true) existing and probably inconsistent pc:Word
